meanings.definition: To change the position of something.
meanings.sent1: The repositioning of the painting made the room look different.
meanings.sent2: The repositioning of the shelves created more space in the closet.
meanings.sent3: The repositioning of the traffic cones confused the drivers.
meanings.sent4: The repositioning of the stars in the sky signaled a new season.
meanings.sent5: The repositioning of the spotlight highlighted the lead singer on stage.
